## Checklist
- [ ] `tsc --noEmit` passes
- [ ] Route bundle size unchanged or smaller

- [ ] Browser-only APIs isolated in client modules
- [ ] `.d.ts` added/updated for Web API gaps
- [ ] Tested on Node 22 locally; Vercel target 22.x
